languages.text: {n}Джай невесело смеется.{/n} "Взорвать реакторный отсек, повредить двигатели... а потом потрошить беспомощный корабль сколько ксеносской душе захочется. О да, узнаю своих "партнеров".

traits.locale_text: {n}Джай невесело смеется.{/n} "Взорвать реакторный отсек, повредить двигатели... а потом потрошить беспомощный корабль сколько ксеносской душе захочется. О да, узнаю своих "партнеров".

languages.text: {n}Jae laughs darkly.{/n} "Blow up the reactor bay, damage the engines... and then disembowel the helpless ship to your xenos heart's content. Oh, yes, that sounds just like my 'partners.'"
languages.original_text: {n}Джай невесело смеется.{/n} "Взорвать реакторный отсек, повредить двигатели... а потом потрошить беспомощный корабль сколько ксеносской душе захочется. О да, узнаю своих "партнеров".

traits.locale_text: "The maadari who was gutting your worlds all this time eventually lured us into a trap? What an unexpected turn of events."
{n}Jae laughs darkly.{/n} "Blow up the reactor bay, damage the engines... and then disembowel the helpless ship to your xenos heart's content. Oh, yes, that sounds just like my 'partners.'"
"The maadari who was gutting your worlds all this time eventually lured us into a trap? What an unexpected turn of events."
"The maadari who has been gutting your worlds all this time has now lured us into a trap? What an unexpected turn of events."
{n}Jae laughs darkly.{/n} "Blow up the reactor bay, damage the engines... and then disembowel the helpless ship to your xenos heart's content. Oh, yes, that sounds just like my 'partners.'"
{n}Jae laughs darkly.{/n} "Blow up the reactor bay, damage the engines... and then disembowel the helpless ship to your xenos heart's content. Oh, yes, that sounds just like my 'partners.'"
{n}Jae laughs darkly.{/n} "Blow up the reactor bay, damage the engines... and then disembowel the helpless ship to your xenos heart's content. Oh, yes, that sounds just like my 'partners.'"

languages.text: {n}ジェイは邪悪な笑みをたたえる。{/n}「リアクターベイを爆破し、エンジンにダメージを与え…異種族の意のままに無力な船を蹂躙するとはな。あたしの『仲間』のやりそうなことだわ」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae laughs darkly.{/n} "Blow up the reactor bay, damage the engines... and then disembowel the helpless ship to your xenos heart's content. Oh, yes, that sounds just like my 'partners.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは邪悪な笑みをたたえる。{/n}「リアクターベイを爆破し、エンジンにダメージを与え…異種族の意のままに無力な船を蹂躙するとはな。私の"同胞"のやりそうなことだわ」

languages.text: {n}Jae éclate d'un rire sinistre.{/n} « L'explosion de la baie du réacteur, les dégâts infligés aux moteurs... avant le démantèlement en règle du pauvre vaisseau en bons xénos digne de ce nom. Ouais, ça ressemble bien à mes "partenaires". »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae laughs darkly.{/n} "Blow up the reactor bay, damage the engines... and then disembowel the helpless ship to your xenos heart's content. Oh, yes, that sounds just like my 'partners.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae éclate d'un rire sinistre.{/n} « L'explosion de la baie du réacteur, les dégâts infligés aux moteurs... avant le démantèlement en règle du pauvre vaisseau en bons xénos digne de ce nom. Ouais, ça ressemble bien à mes "partenaires". »

languages.text: {n}Jae ríe amargamente.{/n} «Volar la bahía del reactor, dañar los motores... y luego destripar a gusto la nave indefensa como buen xenos. Sí, es lo que harían mis "socios"».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae laughs darkly.{/n} "Blow up the reactor bay, damage the engines... and then disembowel the helpless ship to your xenos heart's content. Oh, yes, that sounds just like my 'partners.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae ríe amargamente.{/n} «Volar la bahía del reactor, dañar los motores... y luego destripar a gusto la nave indefensa como buen xenos. Sí, es lo que harían mis "socios"».

languages.text: {n}婕伊阴沉地笑了起来。{/n}“炸掉了反应堆甲板，弄坏了引擎……之后让那些异形把这艘毫无反抗能力的船掏个精光。噢，没错，听起来真像我那群‘同伴’会干的事情。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae laughs darkly.{/n} "Blow up the reactor bay, damage the engines... and then disembowel the helpless ship to your xenos heart's content. Oh, yes, that sounds just like my 'partners.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊阴沉地笑了起来。{/n}“炸掉了反应堆甲板，弄坏了引擎……之后让那些异形把这艘毫无反抗能力的船掏个精光。噢，没错，听起来真像我那群‘同伴’会干的事情。”

languages.text: {n}Jae lacht düster.{/n} "Sprengt die Reaktorbucht, beschädigt die Triebwerke ... und dann weidet das hilflose Schiff aus, wie es Eurem Xenosherz gefällt. Oh, ja. Das klingt nach meinen 'Partnern'."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae laughs darkly.{/n} "Blow up the reactor bay, damage the engines... and then disembowel the helpless ship to your xenos heart's content. Oh, yes, that sounds just like my 'partners.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae lacht düster.{/n} "Sprengt die Reaktorbucht, beschädigt die Triebwerke ... und dann weidet das hilflose Schiff aus, wie es Eurem Xenosherz gefällt. Oh, ja. Das klingt nach meinen 'Partnern'."

languages.text: {n}Jae, canı sıkılmış bir hâlde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Reaktör bölümünü patlatmak, motorlara hasar vermek ve savunmasız geminin içini o zeno gönlüne estiğince boşaltmak. Evet, kulağa tam da 'ortaklarımın' yapacağı bir iş gibi geliyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae laughs darkly.{/n} "Blow up the reactor bay, damage the engines... and then disembowel the helpless ship to your xenos heart's content. Oh, yes, that sounds just like my 'partners.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae, canı sıkılmış bir hâlde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Reaktör bölümünü patlatmak, motorlara hasar vermek ve savunmasız geminin içini o zeno gönlüne estiğince boşaltmak. Evet, kulağa tam da 'partnerlerimin' yapacağı bir iş gibi geliyor."
